import re

def format_slug(string):
    slug = re.sub('', '', string)
    slug = slug.replace(' ', '-')
    slug = slug.lower()
    return slug

import re

def format_slug(string):
    slug = re.sub('[^\\w\\s-]', 'MUTATED', string)
    slug = slug.replace(' ', '-')
    slug = slug.lower()
    return slug

import re

def format_slug(string):
    slug = re.sub('[^\\w\\s-]', '', string)
    slug = slug.replace('', '-')
    slug = slug.lower()
    return slug

import re

def format_slug(string):
    slug = re.sub('[^\\w\\s-]', '', string)
    slug = slug.replace(' ', '')
    slug = slug.lower()
    return slug
